effect: Helps Eggs hatch faster

name: Roto PP Restore

effect: Triples the prize money you receive after battle

name: Roto Stealth
effect: Prevents you from encountering wild Pokemon for a certain period of time

effect: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokemon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar

effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bach sells is curiously popular in Galar

name: Balm Mushroom
effect: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. A maniac will buy it for a high price

name: Beach Glass
effect: A piece of colored glass. Waves have rounded its edges. It's slightly rough to the touch

name: Big Mushroom
effect: A large and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors

name: Big Nugget
effect: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price

name: Big Pearl
effect: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops

effect: A black Apricorn. It has an indescribable scent

effect: A small blue shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago

name: Bob's Food Tin
effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bob sells is curiously popular in Galar

name: Boiled Egg
effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Even just one boiled egg can really enhance a dish

name: Bottle Cap
effect: Maximizes one IV stat in Hyper Training

name: Bread
effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. An indispensable tool for mopping up that extra curry left on your plate

name: Brittle Bones
effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The taste boiled off from the bones is sure to give a dish a light umami taste

name: Carrot Seeds
effect: Seeds to plant in a field. The kind of carrot you'll get is determined by which field you plant the seeds in

name: Chalky Stone
effect: A small whitish stone picked up at the edge of the road

effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw

name: Coconut Milk
effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The refined sweetness of this coconut milk makes it quite popular

name: Comet Shard
effect: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. A maniac will buy it for a high price

name: Cover Fossil
effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back

effect: A fertilizer to be spreaad on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price

name: Dawn Stone
effect: Evolves certain species of Pokemon

name: Discount Coupon
effect: This special coupon allows you to buy items at a discount when you are shopping at a boutique

effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell

name: Dragon Scale
effect: Evolves Seadra when traded holding the item

effect: Evolves Porygon 2 when traded holding the item

effect: Evolves certain species of Pokemon

effect: Evolves Electabuzz when traded holding the item

name: Escape Rope
effect: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon

name: Fairy Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Fairy-type move only once

effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. An apple chosen above others. It has spectacular form and a brilliant sheen

effect: Evolves certain species of Pokemon

name: Fossilized Fish
effect: The fossil of an ancient Pokemon that once lived in the sea. What it looked like is a mystery

name: Fresh Cream
effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Add some whipped cream to a spicy curry to give it some sweetness

effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. It's been a while since it was fried, so it's gotten greasy

effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The syrupy fruits give off a strong tropical feel

name: Galarica Wreath
effect: Evolves Galarian Slowpoke into Galarian Slowking

effect: A fertilizer to be spread on a soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price

effect: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price

effect: An item that attracts Pokemon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokemon

name: Antidote

name: Beast Ball
effect: A special Poke Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others

name: Cherish Ball
effect: A quite rare Poke Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort

name: Dive Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon that live underwater

name: Dream Ball
effect: A special Poke Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokemon

name: Dusk Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokemon at night or in dark places like caves

name: Fast Ball
effect: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon which are quick to run away

name: Friend Ball
effect: A Poke Ball that makes caught Pokemon more friendly

name: Great Ball
effect: A good, high-performance Ball that provies a higher Pokemon catch rate than a standard Poke Ball

name: Heal Ball
effect: A remedial Poke Ball that restores the caught Pokemon's HP and eliminates any status problem

name: Heavy Ball
effect: A Poke Ball for catching very heavy Pokemon

name: Level Ball
effect: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are a lower level than your own

name: Love Ball
effect: Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are the opposite gender of your Pokemon

name: Lure Ball
effect: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon hooked by a Rod when fishing

name: Luxury Ball
effect: A comfortable Poke Ball that makes a caught wild Pokemon quickly grow friendly

name: Master Ball
effect: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokemon without fail

name: Moon Ball
effect: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that evolve using the Moon Stone

name: Nest Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokemon in the wild

name: Net Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Water and Bug-type Pokemon

name: Park Ball
effect: A special Poke Ball for the Pal Park

name: Poke Ball
effect: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It is thrown like a ball at the target. It is designed as a capsule system

name: Premier Ball
effect: A somewhat rare Poke Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort

name: Quick Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter

name: Repeat Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon species that were previously caught

name: Safari Ball
effect: A special Poke Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a camouflage pattern

name: Sport Ball
effect: A special Poke Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest

name: Timer Ball
effect: A somewhat different Ball that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle

name: Ultra Ball
effect: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokemon catch rate than a Great Ball
